summary: Boogie is a violent and ruthless hit man who follows his own rules. Women love him, criminals fear him.
cast: Pablo Echarri|Jesús Ochoa|Nancy Dupláa|Susana Zabaleta|Nicolás Frías|Marcelo Armand|Rufino Gallo|Diego Brizzi|Ricardo Alanis|Luciana Falcón|Karin Zavala|Hernán Chiozza|Mariano Chiesa|Ariel Císter|Ariel Tarico|José Luis Perticarini|Livia Fernán|Susana Sisto|Queco Yerve|Rosario Sánchez Almada|Eduardo Gondell|Paola Monchamps|Damián Stavropulos
title: Boogie, el aceitoso
